forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 7am, then a chance of drizzle and patchy fog. Partly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a subtle veil of drizzle blankets the early hours, ushering in a cool embrace with a low hovering around a refreshing 54 degrees. As dawn approaches, the sky remains predominantly overcast, whispering hints of a marine layer that drifts furtively through the cityscape. The gentle westerly winds carry a salty tang, subtly rustling leaves and stirring the air with a soft promise of change.

As the day unfolds, the drizzle may persist till the morning recedes, giving way to the possibility of patchy fog interspersed with fleeting moments of brightness. Expect temperatures to peak near a cozy 63 before settling back into the nurturing chill of the afternoon. For those navigating the urban tapestry, layering will be key; a light jacket over your favorite shirt will provide comfort against the cool breeze, while sunglasses may be of use as sunshine tries to break through the clouds. 

With a day rich in chances for quiet contemplation, perhaps a stroll through Fort Mason's verdant spaces or a leisurely cafe visit to savor a steaming cup of coffee would be most agreeable. Alternatively, spending time indoors, exploring the artistic depths of the city's galleries, might be the perfect antidote to the capricious weather.
